stepAnswer: the description of the situation, what feelings erupt from the situation, evaluating what is good and not so good about the situation, analyzing the situation to determine what there is to learn from it, concluding what could be done differently, and developing an action plan to improve handling the situation next time
stepTitle: What are the steps of the Gibbs Reflective Cycle?
choices: the description of the situation, what feelings erupt from the situation, evaluating what is good and not so good about the situation, analyzing the situation to determine what there is to learn from it, concluding what could be done differently, and developing an action plan to improve handling the situation next time
